ghclass 0.1.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

    Tools for managing github class organization accounts

    This package is for everyone! But really, if you’re an instructor who uses GitHub for your class management, e.g. students submit assignments via GitHub repos, this package is definitely for you! The package also assumes that you’re and R user, and you probably teach R as well, though that’s not a requirement since this package is all about setting up repositories with the right permissions, not what your students put in those repositories.

    See package vignette for details on how to use the package.
